Judgment of the Storm.name: Judgment of the Storm
Judgment of the Storm.flavor: You unleash bolts of lightning upon those who offend you, smiting them with your power.
Judgment of the Storm.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

Lightning Dance.name: Lightning Dance
Lightning Dance.flavor: Lightning crackles around you, striking any enemy that hits you and allowing you to close with it.
Lightning Dance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever a melee attack hits you, the attacker takes lightning damage equal to your Intelligence modifier, and you can teleport to any space adjacent to the attacker as an immediate reaction.

Wrath of the Clouds.name: Wrath of the Clouds
Wrath of the Clouds.flavor: Lightning leaps around your enemy, lashing the creature whenever it is distracted by another attack.
Wrath of the Clouds.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
Wrath of the Clouds.effect: Whenever the target is hit by an attack, the target takes lightning damage equal to your Intelligence modifier (save ends). The target cannot save against this effect until it is hit at least once.
